FactData__factDesc: 930 Inc is a utility faction that focuses on salvage, repair and refuel. We are a sub faction of The Argentavian Federation.

A neutral economically and militarily focused nation, with many subsidiary corporations. We operate various corporations in many different sectors, as well as operating in military development through our navy and marine corps. We aim to bring prosperity to ourselves and our allies.

Technocratic hive mind aiming to be the state-of-the-art in tech, with goals such as Von Neumann probes. We dedicate personnel to military, diplomacy, trade, industry and everything else that is needed to ensure our goals are reached.
A huge (100+) multiserver space engineers faction that worships the physics engine. We are peaceful to those who know who acknowledge clang as the one true creator
Veteran owned and operated PvP Community
Regardless of your gameplay style, we will have a place for you in Driss, whether you're a friendly merchant, a cunning leader, or a bloodthirsty warrior.
We are a peaceful and simple faction that trades, manufactures and mines. Nevertheless, we are not entirely unprotected with our own military units.
Station construction, trade, ore processing, automation.Our goal is to build from zero a huge trade hub in space. Language English, second language is Russian.
A designing and building faction. Merged with the Argentavian Federation
Military and trading

Known also as Imperium, OwO, and Veritas - we are a multi-purpose faction with a rich history in survival and sandbox MMO games. Our group runs as a stratocracy with priorities covering logistics and PvP for ourselves and allies.
A multipurpose faction specializing mostly in spaceships and trading -subsidiary of Argentavian Federation. https://lingontuva.wixsite.com/lingcorp

We’re a joint force group dedicated to contracting with clients in need of military assistance. This varies from escorts, mercenaries, and bounties. Dire Industries is the industrial portion of mix. They focus on developing efficient ship designs and selling materials to the open market.
Weare salvage, mining and logistics company and we do the odd jobs.
A corporation with multiple subdivisions including manufacturing and private military with plans on expanding to include more as we grow.
Parent organization with two major subsidiaries; Ohnjay's Mining Operation and Harbinger's Forge

We are a tried and tested multi-purpose faction with deep mercantilism expertise and diplomatic experience backed by a hardcore static PVP roster.

A industry-based faction focused on mining, building ships, trading and providing resources.English/Dutch community. A part of the Argentavian Federation as a sub-comp.
A multi-purpose organization designed to work as a Military Trading Corporation.
We are one of the older Starbase factions out there. And as a faction we are striving to become self sufficient with a heavy focus on trading and security services.
Trade fac and Research fac for advanced tec and design, Eng/Ger Community.

Quasar Systems is an independent shipbuilding company. We are a neutral faction but will work with factions and players for custom orders.

FactData__factName: RC&B – Ruddy’s Construction and Burger Co
FactData__factDesc: RC&B is a privately owned Starbase corporation dedicated to neutrality and confidentiality. We offer many services such repairs, ship building, station construction and much more.
We tend to build the nitty-gritty stuff so others can benefit from it.

Artemis Cargo Corporation is here to meet your cargo needs. From transportation of small items all the way to Larger Ships and even troops, ACC is here for you. Artemis Cargo Corporation represents the best in Cargo Transportation to the moon and back!

A neutral Bus company that offers services ranging from simple personnel and cargo transport to combat dropship piloting and even the construction/sale of our proprietary C.A.R.L.O.S missiles.

FactData__factDesc: Cylon is an open non-faction community dedicated to forming a repository of knowledge for yolol, teaching said knowledge to others, and fostering research into new knowledge.

FactData__factName: LEO – Legacy of the Eternal Order
FactData__factDesc: We are a PvP/PvE community representing Empire faction within game. Our primary goal is to be top notch explorers and shipbuilders while forming strong alliances with other Empire and Neutral factions
Our goal is to build a prosperous sector of space in which everyone can safely trade with as and establish diplomatic alliances. We are mostly neutral however we are leaning towards the Empire.

An industrial faction that refines raw materials, reprocesses old materials, and researches new materials for their use in ships, weapons, and other goods made in-faction. We are a faction that is closely linked to the kingdom and its rebellion against the empire and hope to become one of its leading manufacturers of ships and weapons as well as other necessary goods for the cause.
The largest 'Kingdom' military faction. All forms of military combat will be a primary focus. We fight for Freedom and for the Kingdom!

The Fellowship of The Frog follows a feudal system and is a faction allied to the Kingdom with the goals of bringing down the Empire as well as the goal to reach the Pond of the cosmos. The faction aims to be self sufficient and host its own military, the poison dart frogs
A true neutral company that provides everyone with something to do
We are a neutral faction focusing on trading and exploration.
We are a neutral based faction that defend businesses and local community's for fee's.
Neutral, but will do what we want, will help anyone who needs it. But, if that means to go against another faction then so be it.
We are a europe based faction focusing primarily on production and expansion. We allow a lot of personal freedom to our members.
We will primarily be a transportation and mining faction. We will be looking for builders, transport pilots, fighter pilots mining pilots and you are free to do all the above.
